metadata.synopsis: The mutinous duergar is dead, so another takes his place to tells you they are moving on

35.speaker: Kirgrath
35.text: Shit. Brithvar's kicked the tankard. Prick was older than dirt.

65.speaker: Kirgrath
65.text: Here's your cut. Half the spoils, like Brithvar said. ([463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

28.speaker: Kirgrath
28.text: Here's your cut. Just like Brithvar said. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

66.speaker: Kirgrath
66.text: Listen up, Clan Flameshade - we need to cut and run.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

3.speaker: Kirgrath
3.text: It's time I scram, before the buggers at Moonrise charge in.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: And the slaves? What about them?
10.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

1.speaker: Kirgrath
1.text: They belong to the clan. They're coming with us.
1.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Speak up, chief. You can't just let the clan keep them.
53.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

37.speaker: Wyll
37.text: Speak up, chief. You can't just let the clan keep them.
37.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Good idea. They're a valuable asset.
55.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Good idea. They're a valuable asset.
48.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

14.speaker: Kirgrath
14.text: Damn right. We'll keep them busy - this isn't their last dig.
14.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Your heart made of stone? They deserved freedom - and you denied it.
45.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

26.speaker: Wyll
26.text: Your heart made of stone? They deserved freedom - and you denied it.
26.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Brittle are the foundations upon which the houses of tyrants are built. It seems I judged you to be less brittle than you really are.
51.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

54.speaker: Gale
54.text: Brittle are the foundations upon which the houses of tyrants are built. It seems I judged you to be less brittle than you really are.
54.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Whoa. Who the fuck are you?
58.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: Whoa. Who the fuck are you?
38.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

43.speaker: Player
43.text: The gnomes go free. You live. Everyone wins. Clear?
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Set them free, or I will thrash you like I thrashed Nere.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

36.speaker: Kirgrath
36.text: These shitheads aren't worth the hassle. You got yourself a deal.

41.speaker: Kirgrath
41.text: These shitheads aren't worth the hassle. You got yourself a deal.

40.text: Go on, then. Been itching to cut you down a peg.

20.speaker: Kirgrath
20.text: Go on, then. Been itching to cut you down a peg.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Let the gnomes go. They'll just slow you down.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

62.speaker: Kirgrath
62.text: You might be right about that. The more bodies we got, the slower we move.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

23.speaker: Kirgrath
23.text: You might be right about that. The more bodies we got, the slower we move.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

11.speaker: Kirgrath
11.text: You're free, squatties. Get your legs moving, before I change my damn mind.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

24.text: Nah. They slow us down, I hold fire to their arses. You should see 'em dance!

64.speaker: Kirgrath
64.text: Nah. They slow us down, I hold fire to their arses. You should see 'em dance!

60.speaker: Player
60.text: The gnomes should be able to go where they please. They are not the duergar's to keep.

30.speaker: Gale
30.text: The gnomes should be able to go where they please. They are not the duergar's to keep.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Yeah, right. No chance we're letting those bastards take the gnomes with them. Right?

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: Yeah, right. No chance we're letting those bastards take the gnomes with them. Right?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: What makes Moonrise Towers such a threat?
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

42.speaker: Kirgrath
42.text: Place is swarming with Absolute-buggers. And I ain't gonna mess about with 'em.

15.speaker: Kirgrath
15.text: Some General up there giving the orders, the way Nere told it.

32.speaker: Kirgrath
32.text: They got goblins, drow, gnolls, even humans - ain't no one they won't try to turn. The clans included.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Get moving. If I see you slavers again, I'll tear you apart.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Leave - and take the slaves with you. Before I change my mind.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

50.speaker: Kirgrath
50.text: You think? I catch so much as a whiff of you, and I'll have you flayed and fried up for dinner.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

57.speaker: Kirgrath
57.text: Now move out of here - I got shit to be doing.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: And the gold you owe me?

25.speaker: Kirgrath
25.text: My pocket's been picked. Try the cadavers - probably loaded with loot.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Good idea. I'll start by adding your corpse to the pile.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Very well. I'll rummage what I can.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I am freeing these gnomes. Just try and stop me.

67.speaker: Kirgrath
67.text: You don't need to ask twice, jargh.
